content:
Craft an item of type: stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft stone_slab I need to craft stone. To craft stone, I need to smelt cobblestone. Therefore, I will smelt the cobblestone in slot 44 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 44 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft stone_slab I need to craft stone. To craft stone, I need to place three stone items horizontally in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the stone from slot 11 into the crafting grid (eg., slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft stone_slab I need to craft stone. To craft stone, I need to place three stone items horizontally in the crafting grid. I have done so, and the stone_slab is now in the crafting slot (0), therefore I will move it into an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
